New Records: David Warner hit a half-century in his 100th T20I match
Key Match Events: Australia dominated the bookends with Warner and Tim David scoring heavily
West Indies struggled against Adam Zampa's spin bowling
The match was high-scoring with over 400 runs
Key players performed significantly on both sides
Pre-Game Insights: The match was the series-opener and part of World Cup preparations
David Warner was expected to be a key player
Post-Match Reflections: The series is crucial for World Cup preparation
West Indies' fielding and catching were problematic
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match marked the start of the three-match series
Teams were preparing for the T20 World Cup
Others: The match was played on a grassy surface
Behrendorff and Zampa were key performers
